remarks: Express the tangent function directly in terms of ` exp ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Feb-2015.)
statement: tanval2 $p |- ( ( A e. CC /\ ( cos ` A ) =/= 0 ) -> ( tan ` A ) = ( ( ( exp ` ( _i x. A ) ) - ( exp ` ( -u _i x. A ) ) ) / ( _i x. ( ( exp ` ( _i x. A ) ) + ( exp ` ( -u _i x. A ) ) ) ) ) ) $.
